text: Aja timro nimti sampurna pavitra kuraharu halala gari'eka chan ra ahale kitaba (yahudi, isa'i)le jab'ha gareko masu va khana pani timila'i halala cha ra timile jab'ha gareko masu va bhojana uniharuko lagi halala chan. Pavitra momina svasni manisaharu ra ti manisaharu jasala'i timibhanda pahila kitaba pradana gari'eko thiyo, tiniharuka pavitra svasni manisaharu pani halala chin, jaba ki tinako mahara timile dinchau, yasari ki tiniharusamga pavitra sambandha rakhne uddesyale vivaha garnu hos naki khullamakhulla va lukichipi vyabhicara garne uddesyale. Yadi kasaile imana tyagcha bhane tyasaka sabai karmaharu nirarthaka chan ra akhiratama (antima dinama) tiniharu noksani bhogneharuma hunechan
